0: I am looking for a cozy and family-friendly home in community_1 (longxing). It is an ideal option for my family as it offers nearby parks and recreational facilities. I have a budget of 10,000 per month and I am willing to negotiate and consider different options within community_1 or nearby areas. I need a house urgently due to my growing family and the need for a safe space for my child to play. If you have any suitable houses available for rent, please reach out to me. Thank you.
